title: Trouble Logging in
body: I've had trouble logging in to League, I keep getting the error prompt "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists, contact support at...". I don't know what caused this, I got on after a few weeks about three days ago, I downloaded the new patch, then I played then and also the day after, but I started getting this error yesterday and it has persisted. I go to log in, it seems to process for a few minutes, then gives this error.

replies.body: That could either be happening from some missing or corrupted game files, which you should be able to fix with a quick repair through the client options. If that doesn't help then this is most likely a connection related problem. Most of the time a good adjustment to your Port Forwarding and DNS settings by using those steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but it's worth it to do the other steps as well if those 2 don't help immediately.

Hi Broporo, I did what you suggested and ran a full client repair, unfortunately i'm still having the issue of not being able to log in. I don't believe my connection is the issue, as I'm not playing on internet through a router. I'm actually using the hotspot in my data plan, as I don't have the money for WiFi yet. Four days without League and i'm starting to feel common withdrawal symptoms.

I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but a phone's hotspot wifi isn't likely going to work very well for League. League needs a stable connection and hotspots aren't designed to play multiplayer games on, but rather just to get some quick and easy work done when stable internet isn't available.
The Hotspot has seemed to work fine until now, it's perfectly steady unless I get texted, and you need friends for that. I get 3MB/s download speeds and 55 ping.
